Projects

projects.title: Twitch Song Request Desktop
projects.description: A Windows desktop Twitch song request application with multi-platform support for song requests
features: Song requests are read from Twitch channel points redeem rewards
Supports song requests from Spotify and Youtube
Spotify songs are played via local Spotify installation
Youtube videos are played inside application

projects.title: Twitch Spotify Song Request
projects.description: A simple javascript and python script for Twitch Spotify song requests
features: Python script for generating Twitch and Spotify access tokens
HTML page with only Javascript which can be added to OBS as a browser source
No hosting required after initial setup

projects.title: Staff Restaurant Lunch Menu App
projects.description: A lunch menu mobile application with frontend and backend for previous employer staff restaurant
features: Mobile frontend with Flutter and Dart, backend with Java Spring Boot
Backend Fetches lunch menu weekly, saves to database, frontend requests menu with Rest Api
Extra features like view menu history, vote on courses, stats about courses

projects.title: RÃ¤ccis SeAMK Food Royale
projects.description: An Android lunch menu mobile application for a friend
features: Displays two restaurants daily lunch menu side by side
Fetches Sodexo lunch menu with rest api in Json
Scrapes Eventti lunch menu from website html

projects.title: Tsumppi Coffee Shop
projects.description: An Android catalogue application for SeAMK student services coffee shop
features: Coffee shop products catalogue and latest social media posts
Catalogue data is fetched from google sheets
Latest social media posts are fetched from Facebook and Instagram

projects.title: SeAMK Lukkari
projects.description: An Android timetable mobile application for SeAMK students
features: Displays a student group's daily, weekly and period timetable
Create your own timetable, view other student group's timetables, search for an empty room
See weekly lunch menus from student restaurants

projects.title: SeAMK WinhaWille
projects.description: An Android study registry mobile application for SeAMK students
features: See your GPA and student credits
See all your completed courses and grades

projects.title: SeAMK Ruoka
projects.description: An Android lunch menu mobile application for SeAMK students
features: See weekly lunch menus from student restaurants
